message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you is $15000. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a compromise.

Bob, I understand your perspective.  While $9000 is a good price, it doesn't reflect the true value of the product.  I'm willing to go down to $10500.  This is a significant reduction from my initial offer, but it's the best I can do at this point. Let's try to find some common ground.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $10000. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product to me.
